from zExceptions import Unauthorized
 if REQUEST is not None:
 raise Unauthorized
 
 if (context.getPaymentMode() != 'payzen'):
 return
 
 portal = context.getPortalObject()
 integration_site = portal.restrictedTraverse(portal.portal_preferences.getPreferredPayzenIntegrationSite())
 
 ticket_relative_url = integration_site.getCategoryFromMapping('SourceProject/%s' % context.getId().replace('-', '_'))
 if ticket_relative_url != 'source_project/%s' % context.getId().replace('-', '_'):
 ticket = portal.restrictedTraverse(ticket_relative_url)
 else:
 ticket = portal.support_request_module.newContent(
 portal_type='Support Request',
 source_project_value=context,
 title='Payzen Transaction to check',
 )
 ticket.validate(comment='New automatic ticket for %s' % context.getTitle())
 
 try:
 mapping = integration_site.getCategoryFromMapping(
 'SourceProject/%s' % context.getId().replace('-', '_'),
 create_mapping_line=True,
 create_mapping=True)
 except ValueError:
 pass
 integration_site.SourceProject[context.getId().replace('-', '_')].setDestinationReference(ticket.getRelativeUrl())
 
 return ticket
